reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, with one noting it's not itchy at all, and appreciate its versatility as it can be dressed up or worn casually. Moreover, the dress receives positive feedback for its style, with customers noting it can be dressed up, and one mentioning it's perfect for fall pictures with family. Additionally, the material is soft and the dress is beautifully made. However, customers disagree on the material thickness, with some describing it as good while others find it thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE it great dress!
items.body: Such a cute dress. The quality is great and the material is so soft and comfy. The size was perfect except it was a little short on my 5'4 sister (size small). The cut as flattering and absolutely perfect! And it even has pockets! the material as a great weight for fall. This dress is good for everyday use, fall photos, church, and more casual wedding...I love it. Read more
items.author: NayVee Reese

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everyday & maternity recommended
items.body: Fits like a dream! 5’6” 163# Normally a medium and probably should have got a medium not a large. But I’m also 11wks and wanted to ensure it fit through the whole pregnancy. Very cozy and looked super cute. Lots of complements at work. The pockets were a nice surprise. Quality - good Stretchiness- good Fabric weight- light but warm Sheerness- recommended leggings under but probably fine without too. Likely will get one more color! Read more
items.author: Leah

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress but see through
items.body: Overall really nice dress. The fit was perfect even with a bigger chest the fabric was soft and stretchy. I loved the big pockets and and the overall shape was nice. The only downside was how see though it was. I had to be extra careful what I wore under because how how see though it was. Read more
items.author: Kenzie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm & true to size
items.body: I'm 18 weeks pregnant and looking for fall/winter dresses that are cozy and growing belly friendly. Prior to getting pregnant I was a large bordering and XL in a variety of clothing. I figured I'd try this dress in an XL but it was too big. It's very cute and I think I could get away with wearing it the entirety of my pregnancy but I felt it's just baggy enough where it takes away from the true shape of the dress and my body, making it took just it tad bit untidy. I'm returning it and ordering a large and considering purchasing in at least one other color. If the sizing is consistent, I'm sure the large will also fit me throughout the pregnancy or at least most of it. The dress wasn't sheer. The pockets are large and perfect. And enough the dress is thin, it's warmer than expected. Overall I really like the dress but hoping that the sizing and quality are consistent. Also, crossing my fingers out washed well. Read more
items.author: Kitty

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing!
items.body: I'm in LOVE! This is my back up Christmas party dress. Just in case I feel like going more casual. But to be honest this is way more flattering than I thought! I look great in this! And it has pockets! So happy with this purchase. It is thin, but with some fleece lined tights I der it, it will be perfect for an outdoor get together. I highly recommend! I'm 187 lbs, 5'1", and I ordered an xl and it fit perfectly! Read more
items.author: Lindsey Williams

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good not great
items.body: Nice material, soft and thick but not too thick.Nice length, the cinched part could be better to make a little more flattering, ended up returning both sizes I ordered because it didn’t lay right Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute comfy dress!
items.body: Quality was great, true to size, so soft and comfortable to wear, do great in the wash , stretch and comfort fit. Will order again. Read more
items.author: mindy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Comfy!
items.body: Such a cute and comfy dress. This is great for the fall or winter and the material is so soft. Bonus: there are pockets! I get so many compliments when I wear this dress! Read more
items.author: Victoria Limbeck

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown Striped, Blue, Apricot, Black, Coffee, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red, Brown Plaid, Caramel Striped, Khaki, Purple, Beige Print. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
